title: Ticket #3845: Param system ignoring per-daemon overrides
description: It was discovered and fixed that the param system was ignoring per daemon overrides see ticket #3822. We want to add a test to test this out to avoid futures issues happening without detection. It was also discovered that a daemon specific override which referenced a previous define could lead to an infinate loop of parsing. This example from ticket #3822 was added as a third check making a total of 4 including the first check which simply tests for a job being able to run with the starting configuration.
remarks:

be sure to have a test for self reference
